name: Neon Starlight (itch)
description:
Ahoy!

Here's a quick little game for you. Dodge all of the things! See if you can make it through unscathed :)

This is kinda a tech demo for my bullet pattern scripting engine I made in Unity. If you want to mess with the files and change the patterns, go in Files/NeonStarlight_data/StreamingAssets. The file for the patterns is Level1.txt. 

Enjoy!
